body_html:
The problem is that you have not ran the initialization operation before doing the optimization.
If you add session.run(tf.global_variables_initializer()) before calling optimizer.minimize(session) the code will work fine.
body_text:
The problem is that you have not ran the initialization operation before doing the optimization.
If you add session.run(tf.global_variables_initializer()) before calling optimizer.minimize(session) the code will work fine.
body:
The problem is that you have not ran the initialization operation before doing the optimization.
If you add `session.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())` before calling `optimizer.minimize(session)` the code will work fine.
